person.about: Hello Minna-san, thank you for visiting my website, my name is Antony Mirasandy born in Tangerang, Indonesia. At this time i want to focus on becoming a software engineer and learn more about several programming languages, frameworks that are currently used, and make several projects for exercise

education.name: BSI
education.major: Diploma Degree Information Systems / Web Programming

portfolio.title: Simple REST API CRUD ( Golang )
portfolio.desc: Develop simple REST API with Golang, MUX as library / framework router and using MySQL as database

activities.title: Final project presentation on EnigmaCamp
activities.desc: The presentation of the pick my food application, where someone can order food & beverage anywhere and anytime, the application was developed by didin, apin as a mobile developer, angga as a frontend web developer, and antony, benyamin as a backend developer
